Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed,

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Broaddus, Appellant.
Submitted November 13, 1967.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Spencer Broaddns, appellant, in propria persona.
Walter M. Phillips, Jr. and Alan J. Davis, Assistant District Attorneys, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
March 15, 1968:
